if.test: startTime != null and startTime != '' or endTime!=null and endTime!=''

where.if: and mc.create_time between to_date('${startTime}','yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') and to_date('${endTime}','yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss')

mapper.sql: from mb_collect_record mc left join mb_water_meter_info mwm on mc.water_meter_info_id=mwm.id left join tb_region tr on mwm.area_id=tr.id left join tb_apartment ta on mwm.apartment_id=ta.id left join tb_floor tf on mwm.build_id=tf.id left join tb_layer tl on mwm.floor_id=tl.id left join tb_room tro on mwm.room_id=tro.id left join mb_water_meter mw on mwm.water_meter_id=mw.id
mapper.select: select mc.id id, tr.name areaName, ta.name apartmentName, tf.name buildName, tl.name floorName, tro.name roomNum, mw.water_meter_id waterMeterNum, case mc.current_status when 0 then '未下发' when 1 then '下发成功' when 2 then '下发失败' else '其他' end currentStatusName, mc.create_time createTime, mc.buy_water_total buyWaterTotal, mc.supplement_water supplementWater, mc.over_water overWater, mc.user_water userWater

select mc.id id, tr.name areaName, ta.name apartmentName, tf.name buildName, tl.name floorName, tro.name roomNum, mw.water_meter_id waterMeterNum, case mc.current_status when 0 then '未下发' when 1 then '下发成功' when 2 then '下发失败' else '其他' end currentStatusName, mc.create_time createTime, mc.buy_water_total buyWaterTotal, mc.supplement_water supplementWater, mc.over_water overWater, mc.user_water userWater
where mc.id=#{id}
